text: Cao Chunan (; August 15, 1930 â€“ August 27, 2020) was a Chinese scientist. His works focused in corrosion and electrochemistry. He was a member of the Jiusan Society. In 1991, he became a member of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. Cao was born in Changshu County, Jiangsu. Cao died on August 27, 2020 in Hangzhou, Zhejiang at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese chemists Category:Scientists from Jiangsu Category:20th-century Chinese scientists
title: Cao Chunan
